Text:
Last torrent didn't work. I had to create a new one. I deeply apologize to everyone for making you go through so much trouble. This one now works and I will be seeding it 24/7 for quite a while. 

Try watching the movie you downloaded with the last torrent though. I know the download didn't complete 100% but the file should work ok.

found this machine translation for ENGLISH subtitles for this film. may be of some use to someone.

And by the way; the link to the movie speedx008 looks quite interesting (a documentary about Rouch), but it is not the movie in this torrent.

Thank you!
Everybody is stuck at 99.8% for days now ... This is such BS... If u can't seed properly, don't seed at all, esp these kind of movies, that some people r really interested in...

I'm sorry, I've been out of town for a few days and I am having problems with my DSL.
There is no problem with the seed. Besides, I am not the only one, there are 4 other seeders. I have seeded 1.5GBs so far, so maybe the problem is with you.

If you can't download properly then don't make any comments.
